<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This class implements a partial ordering visitor, which visits a cyclic graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in natural topological-like ordering. Topological ordering is not defined for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// directed graphs with cycles, so this assumes cycles are a single node, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ignores back-edges. The cycle is visited from the entry in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// topological-like ordering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: this visitor REQUIRES a reducible graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This means once we visit a node, we know all the possible ancestors have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// visited.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clang-format off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given this graph:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ,-&gt; B -\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A -+        +---&gt; D ----&gt; E -&gt; F -&gt; G -&gt; H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#96;-&gt; C -/      ^                 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                   +-----------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Visit order is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  A, &#91;B, C in any order&#93;, D, E, F, G, H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clang-format on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Changing the function CFG between the construction of the visitor and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// visiting is undefined. The visitor can be reused, but if the CFG is updated,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the visitor must be rebuilt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/partialorderingvisitor"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/partialorderingvisitor/#afa6befc04cbb0a31a669dadbac54ac19">PartialOrderingVisitor</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/domtreebuilder/#ae5476cfab53290776b8a0fbe98e391f2">DomTreeBuilder::BBDomTree</a> DT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> LI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns true is |LHS| comes before |RHS| in the partial ordering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If |LHS| and |RHS| have the same rank, the traversal order determines the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order (order is stable).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/partialorderingvisitor/#aa999c9f9a9a1cd57c4b1d8314c02374c">compare</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Visit the function starting from the basic block |Start|, and calling |Op|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on each visited BB. This traversal ignores back-edges, meaning this won&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// visit a node to which |Start| is not an ancestor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Op returns |true|, the visitor continues. If |Op| returns false, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// visitor will stop at that rank. This means if 2 nodes share the same rank,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and Op returns false when visiting the first, the second will be visited</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// afterwards. But none of their successors will.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/partialorderingvisitor/#a519632457ebb4e761c4df4e29c6dd143">partialOrderVisit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;Start,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         std::function&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;)&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
